verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) Behold, <WH2009> bless <WH1288> the Lord, <WH3068> all <WH3605> servants <WH5650> of the Lord, <WH3068> Who serve <WH5975> by night <WH3915> in the house <WH1004> of the Lord! <WH3068>
Lift <WH5375> up your hands <WH3027> to the sanctuary, <WH6944> And bless <WH1288> the Lord. <WH3068>
May the Lord <WH3068> bless <WH1288> you from Zion, <WH6726> He who made <WH6213> heaven <WH8064> and earth. <WH776>
